MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Waiting for midnight, we creep onto the premises of the evil circus. There are minimal lights on, but no one is in sight. Will this be a piece of cake?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I can smell Saruhiko over there.
Guided by Kuang, we make our way through the circus equipment and luggage. But just before we reach the hut, something suddenly flies out. Kuang dodges it with her amazing reflexes.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I wonder if there's a guard dog...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
I don't like dogs because they fight with monkeys...
Huh, but does that mean they're protecting monkeys now?

I don't think he's protecting the monkey,
he's just following the owner's orders.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Oh, I see. Hey, guard dog. I need you to let me and Conductor through.
I won't do anything if you move our of the way.

But instead of retreating from the scene,
the guard dog bends down and jumps on Kuang again.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Wah, he jumped on me!
I knew I couldn't talk to a dog!

Although she said she doesn't like dogs, the gentle Kuang only avoids attacking and never tries to hurt the guard dog. However, it'll be difficult to get rid of the guard dog without hurting it. If it continues to make a scene, the circus ring master will notice us.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: We're so close to Saruhiko's cage...
The guard dog is closing in on us. Just when I think we have no choice but to force our way through, a group of monkeys comes running into the tent with loud cries.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: You're all here!?
The monkeys quickly surround the guard dog. They have come all the way across the ocean from the island to be here, fearing for Kuang and Saruhiko.

The guard dog that had been so vicious earlier
flinches at the sudden outnumbering.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
The tables have turned.
I can bring Saruhiko back―
―Please, bring back the monkey!

Just as Kuang's getting excited about finally rescuing Saruhiko, the ring master of the group appears from behind the tent. He's holding a monkey in his arms... or rather, it looks like he's being held by a monkey.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: ...What do you mean?
As Kuang and the monkeys look on, the ring master speaks with a tearful look on his face as Saruhiko slaps him on the cheek.
He said he went to the island, met Saruhiko, gave him some fruit, and he was charmed by it. He says that he didn't bring him here by force, but that he just followed him on his own.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Is that true, Saruhiko?
Saruhiko gives an apologetic squeak. I don't need Kuang to translate for me. He got sucked in by the fruit...?

The ring master wanted to continue the circus with Saruhiko, but he would only eat melons and would not listen to him at all. However, he said, that did not mean he could accept the accusation that he had kidnapped her.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: ...Saruhiko, sit there.
Saruhiko sits a little in front of Kuang, who stares at him. The ring master makes a tearful appeal to Saruhiko.

I'm sorry. I'd like you to stay,
but I can't afford food anymore...
In other words, Saruhiko was not kidnapped, and there was no need to sneak into the circus to rescue him.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Saruhiko, you're really a bad boy, worrying everyone and causing trouble for the ring master.

Kuang crouches down in front of Saruhiko and reprimands her harshly.
Then Kuang gently hugs Saruhiko.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: But I'm glad you're okay.
Saruhiko, who hugs Kuang happily, turns to me and screaches.

No worries. No need to thank me.
After all, it's not like I did much.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Conductor, you know what Saruhiko is saying.
I'm happy. He says he's happy, too.

Kuang speaks with a big smile on her face.
Since her smile came back, then I guess the matter is settled.

The monkeys then discuss the matter and decide that they will take turns working in the circus to help out as an apology for the trouble Saruhiko had caused. The ring master is so impressed that he turns over the circus vault and serves fruit.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Saruhiko says he'll do his best.
Saruhiko screeches, followed by dozens of monkeys. The monkeys, who have such a strong bond with each other, are very motivated. I'm sure they'll give a great performance.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Okay, guys. Take care.
Kuang is happy to have everyone together again, and she hugs each one of them. After the military formalities, we have to return to St. Iris, but we're a little sad to say goodbye to the monkeys.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
I'm not lonely, because this is not goodbye.
Next time we meet, let's eat lots of delicious fruit together.

The monkeys and the ring master see us off with smiles on their faces.
Kuang's belief in the future is conveyed to everyone, regardless of background. If she's right, the time to reunite will surely come.
